description:
This “Learn How to Remix a Song: Learn How to Become a Music Producer “course was designed to provide experience for those individuals who want remix music professionally. Today’s music is going through a major evolution and our goal is to help you navigate through it and empower you to push the evolutionary process yourself.

Whether you like Hip Hop, Pop, Techno, Jazz, R&B, Gospel or Rock, Craig wants to equip you with the skills and knowledge you need to help manifest your musical dreams. A crucial aspect to that is the gear you use. Although still used, you don’t need 12 foot long mixing consoles and big, heavy machines with a million knobs that cost a lot of money and take up a lot of space to be a record producer. Most of what you need to make hit records and large checks is right in your computer.

What is unique about this “Learn How to Remix a Song: Learn How to Become a Music Producer“ course? The instructor has the real world experience relevant to today’s music industry and he practices what he preaches daily in his career as producer . The skills and information learned in this course is something that you can use and see the results of right now. Craig Groove has worked on projects that have received awards and sold millions of records. Now, he personally wants to deliver this knowledge to you.

Craig Groove started out much like you, so he understands what it’s like to have the eagerness to learn, but not have the means or support to make it happen. He has figured out how to get started in this business called music and how to take it to the level of success most desire and now you will know how it’s done step-by-step. When you finish this course, you will have the knowledge you need to make it happen.

Learn How to Remix a Song: Learn How to Become a Music Producer course

</p>

Lesson 1 – SYNCING THE ACAPELLA TO METRONOME
Importing Audio and BPM synchronization

Lesson 2 – BUILDING THE FOUNDATION
Creating the Basic Drum Pattern Loop

Lesson 3 - ADDING THE SEASONING SALT
Adding Melodies Using VST Instruments

Lesson 4 – FORMATTING THE SONG (PT. 1)
Copying and the Arrangement of the Segments

Lesson 5 - FORMATTING THE SONG (PT. 2)
Creating the Intro

Lesson 6 - FORMATTING THE SONG (PT. 3)
Creating Breaks and Drops

Lesson 7 – THE MIXDOWN
Blending of the Individual Tracks

Lesson 8 – MASTERING THE REMIX
Normalizing and Sweetening of the Overall Track

Take this ultimate course right now and learn how to remix a song like a pro and learn how to become a music producer .

</p>
title: Learn How To Remix
